subject: Re: Searching for a mail client
body:
I use Wanderlust. If you use emacs maybe you should consider using it.

With an apt-get install wl-beta and a bit of tweaking the configs
everything works fine. ;)


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-laptop-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
